Commentary: Hasan Ali to Smith, no run, excellent start, right on the money. Angles it into middle from wide of the crease, pushed to mid on
Hasan Ali to Smith, 1 run, width on offer, slapped away towards square third man
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, Flicked away superbly! Fetches the stroke from outside off, one bounce into the midwicket boundary. Sweet timing
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, mistimes the pull this time, fortunately for Islamabad, it was hit wide of Afridi at mid-on
Hasan Ali to Smith, no run, induces the edge, just falls short of Darren Sammy at slip. Smith goes hard at it, gets a thick edge. Sammy made it clear immediately that it didn't carry
Hasan Ali to Smith, no run, played back down the pitch, the bowler hurls an angry throw to the striker's end, wide of the keeper. Sammy gets a hand on it
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, no run, floats it ahead of length area on off, nips back in a touch, Sharjeel looks to flay that through cover point but is beaten
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, no run, pulled, but straight to Sammy at midwicket. Struck well though
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, on the pads and those are easy pickings. Flicked behind square on the leg side. No one in the deep, races away into the fine leg boundary
Tait to Smith, 4 leg byes, poor ball again, a yorker gone completely wrong. Drifting down leg, he looks to tickle it fine but the ball deflects off the pad and into the fine leg boundary
Tait to Smith, no run, back of length delivery on middle, straightens a touch, he shows the full face of the bat and taps it back to the bowler
Tait to Smith, no run, on the pads again, misses the flick, ball was sliding down leg though
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, no run, solidly defended to short cover
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, disdainfully done. Hops back and whip-pulls that into the fine leg boundary
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, looks to pull, gets an inside edge onto the pad as the ball rolls to the off side
Hasan Ali to Smith, 1 run, flicked wide of midwicket, a misfield allows them a single
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, no run, plays it late, lends direction to that delivery angling away, played towards point
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, excellent drive down the ground. Leans forward and hits it on the up, shows the full face of the bat too and holds the pose for the cameras. Ah, majestic
Tait to Smith, no run, firm push, but straight to mid-off
Tait to Smith, 1 leg bye, misses the nudge, hit high on the pad, the ball deflects towards square leg
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, whipped off his hip, the ball screamed away towards deep square leg
Tait to Smith, 1 run, on the pads, worked wide of midwicket
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, in his slot and lofted over the infield, one bounce into the long-on boundary. Picked the slower delivery nice and early, and boom
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, no run, excellent bouncer on middle and leg, Sharjeel ducks under that one
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, no run, loopy delivery on middle, played back down the pitch
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, no run, arm-ball this time, he shapes to cut but ball kept coming back in and cramped him for room, took the inside edge, missed leg stump though
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, no run, slows it down this time, lands it on middle, tapped to the off side
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, no run, tucked to square leg
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, no run, slow turn, this time punched to cover
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, 1 run, worked away to midwicket
Shahid Afridi to Smith, no run, thumped back down the pitch, good stop by Afridi
Shahid Afridi to Smith, no run, drifts into middle, hit straight to midwicket
Shahid Afridi to Smith, 1 run, eased towards midwicket, this time they manage to get across for a single
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, no run, looks to cut but this one skids across the surface, beaten
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, no run, punched to cover, spinners applying the brakes here
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, punched wide of cover, another tight over
Mohammad Asghar to Sharjeel Khan, no run, flatter one on off, turned to mid-on
Mohammad Asghar to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, looks to sweep, gets a bit of glove, rolls to short fine. Was too early into the stroke
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, no run, tossed up on middle, he's half forward and bunts it back to the bowler
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, 1 run, played wide of midwicket, mistimed but they'll get a run
Mohammad Asghar to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, shapes to cut, mistimes the hit to deep point
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, 1 run, slogs across the line, hit down to deep midwicket
Shahid Afridi to Smith, 1 run, flat hit, almost a release shot, but can only hit it as far as long on, good stop
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, excellent stroke, uses the width to cut that behind point, Hafeez does well to slide across but just pushed it over the ropes as he tried to pull it back in
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, no run, cuts again, straight to the fielder this time
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, swung down the ground to long on
Shahid Afridi to Smith, 2 runs, mistimes a slog across the line, gets a leading edge that eludes the short third man fielder
Shahid Afridi to Smith, 1 run, tucked to deep midwicket, Smith will keep strike
Mohammad Asghar to Smith, 1 run, whipped across the line to long-on, 50 up
Mohammad Asghar to Sharjeel Khan, no run, walks across, looks to sweep with the spin, toe ends it to midwicket
Mohammad Asghar to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, steps out, can't get to the pitch but goes through with the swing, gets enough elevation and distance. Sails into the stands. Sourav Ganguly-esque
Mohammad Asghar to Sharjeel Khan, no run, good stop at point by Sammy, not a clean stop but they don't risk his arm
Mohammad Asghar to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, gets underneath that one and slog sweeps that over wide long-on. Muscular hit, they're finally getting a move on
Mohammad Asghar to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, slapped over the bowler's head, bisects long-off and long-on
Shahid Afridi to Smith, 1 run, fierce sweep, straight to Hafeez at deep square
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, walks across the stumps and helps it wide of short fine, excellent half-century this. Inventive, effervescent and extremely tactful
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, that has been hammered into the deep midwicket boundary. Sweet sound as ball met bat. He's hitting sixes at well. Flat hit, easily done
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, squeezed to long-off, too full that time
Shahid Afridi to Smith, 1 run, worked away across the line to Wahab at long on
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, no run, cuts and misses, that one was fired outside off
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run, looks to pull, hit high on the thigh pad, late on the shot
Wahab Riaz to Smith, 1 run, worked off his hip to deep square leg
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, width on offer and slapped over point, that went to the boundary at the rate of knots. A square cut off the frontfoot
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, pulled across the line, but straight to deep midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Smith, 1 run, pulled, but not entirely off the middle, rolls to deep square
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, slower bouncer, helped over the infield, down to deep midwicket, was in total control of that stroke
Sammy to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, makes room and hammers it over cover, no chance for the boundary rider
Sammy to Sharjeel Khan, no run, slower and fuller, hit back hard, Sammy stops it with his boot

Sammy to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, whipped into the deep square boundary. Sanath Jayasuriya would have been proud of that stroke. Slightly short, he walked across and helped that over the ropes. What timing
Sammy to Sharjeel Khan, no run, good stop by Afridi at the edge of the circle at cover
Sammy to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, worked wide of midwicket, he'll keep strike
Sammy to Smith, 1 run, too full outside off, swung across the line, aother mishit, this time to deep square
Wahab Riaz to Smith, 1 run, floats a length ball on off, he buts it towards point and scoots across for a quick single
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, pulled in front of square, straight to deep midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Smith, no run, rip roaring bouncer, he shapes to pull but sways out of the way in the end
Wahab Riaz to Smith, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, that is a monster hit. Dismissive of Pakistan's tearaway quick. Bowls it on length, he swings through the line, muscles it way over long-on. 30 rows back
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, no run, good stop at point

Tait to Smith, OUT, floats it full on middle from wide of the crease, Smith looks to work it across the line, misses and the umpire didn't take long to raise the finger. Relief for Islamabad, maybe? A poor innings has come to an end, more of a struggle really. That's one wicket the team management wouldn't be too perturbed about.

Tait to Haddin, OUT, make that two in two. This one's fired full and onto the base of middle, Haddin looks to back away and carve it over point, was beaten by pace. Tait is pumped, and why not. He's got his Aussie mate first ball
Tait to Khalid Latif, 1 run, Down leg, he looks to pull but gets a bit of glove on it, Kamran Akmal has put down a sitter Hat-trick missed
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, looks to squeeze it behind point, opens the face at the last minute and eases it fine
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, plays the upper cut this time. Uses the pace and bounce to good effect, unbelievable batting. Sails over third man
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, arches back and helps it over the keeper's head, straight to fine third man
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, low full toss, pushed wide of cover
Hasan Ali to Khalid Latif, 1 leg bye, too early into the pull, hit on the shoulder, they sneak in a leg-bye
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, squeezed back past the bowler to long-off
Hasan Ali to Khalid Latif, 1 run, mistimes a cut wide of point, Afridi fires a throw at the striker's end, not needed, could have so easily been overthrows
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, 1 leg bye, looks to whip it away, hit high on the thigh pad, lobs to the off side
Hasan Ali to Khalid Latif, FOUR, slapped into the gap at cover, no one in the deep and that was headed only one way
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, no run, fired into middle, pushed back down to the bowle
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, straight down the ground, just clears the long-off boundary. That, ladies and gentlemen, is the first hundred in PSL history
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, cut away into the gap at deep point
Shahid Afridi to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, looks to slog across the line, gets a thick edge that flies over the keeper's head
Shahid Afridi to Khalid Latif, 1 run, worked wide of square leg
Shahid Afridi to Sharjeel Khan, no run, looks to play a reverse scoop over short third man, misses. Ugly attempt
Tait to Khalid Latif, 1 run, excellent yorker, somehow manages to jam his bat down and hit it towards mid-on
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, no run, another yorker on middle, squeezed back to the bowler
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, SIX, how easily has he done it? Length ball, slapped over long-on. He packs a punch when he connects
Tait to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, hit wide of Afridi at cover
Tait to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, squeezed off the thick inside edge towards deep midwicket, they somehow scamble the second
Tait to Khalid Latif, 1 run, hit hard, straight to deep midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Khalid Latif, 1 run, toeing the wide line again, this time he gets some bat on it, squeezed wide of point
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, no run, backs away to go over point, bowler bowls it full and just outside his hitting range, top bowling
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, hit wide of point for a quick single
Wahab Riaz to Khalid Latif, 1 run, hit down the ground, one bounce to long-on

Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, no run, dropped at cover, he picked the bones out of that and Shahid Yousuf puts that down on the second attempt. Powerfully hit, the fielder was knocked back as he got his hands on that. Stinging blow
Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, no run, looks to swing across the line, misses and the ball kisses the off stump and goes to the keeper. Not sure how the stumps didn't break there
Hasan Ali to Khalid Latif, no run, full outside off, near the wide line, he lets it go thinking it would be called wide
Hasan Ali to Khalid Latif, FOUR, slapped over extra cover, no one in the deep. 50 stand comes up
Hasan Ali to Khalid Latif, no run, full and wide outside off, he looks to go over long on, can't get underneath the line
Hasan Ali to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, hit to the man at sweeper cover
Hasan Ali to Khalid Latif, 1 run, looks to fetch a slog from outside off, doesn't get any power behind that, lands in front of the man running in from deep midwicket
Hasan Ali to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, whipped into the gap between deep midwicket and wide long-on. Low full toss, he walked across the stumps and picked it away superbly
Wahab Riaz to Khalid Latif, no run, gets a bottom edge, keeper up to the task, dot ball to start with
Wahab Riaz to Khalid Latif, 1 run, squeezed to cover

Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, 2 runs, everything he's touched has turned to gold. Walked across to scoop it over short fine, the ball took the back of the bat and deflected towards short third man instead

Wahab Riaz to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, OUT, he's gone while trying to take a second run. That brings an end to an innings of his lifetime. This one was hit down the ground, Wahab misfielded and deflected the ball towards mid-on. Sharjeel's desperation to keep strike meant he looked to pinch a second but his partner turned his back, and it was all too late by the time he could attempt to get back
Wahab Riaz to Khalid Latif, FOUR, in his hitting zone, slapped over long-on
Wahab Riaz to Khalid Latif, 1 run, right into the blockhole, squeezed wide of point
